title: Steelers Headed to the Superbowl Type :-)
content:

Chris
author: dezcom

comments.content: Congratulations! Who will they be playing? ;-)

In less than 2 minutes I can congratulate you as well :-)

ChrisL
I never expected 2 of my favourite things — type and the Steelers — would collide so nicely. Sweet.

Sara,  
Were you always a Californian or was western PA part of your past?

ChrisL

Hey Chis, congrats on the win!

See you next season!

Si

 ![](http://web.archive.org/files/hawks.jpg)

building 21, 1 MSFT Way Redmond, WA.

Your a true gentleman Si. The Seahawks have nothing to be ashamed of. They played a tough game and could have won if a few things had gone there way. They got a bad call on the push-off penalty which was not too much of a push. Holmgren did a great coaching job too. The Seahawks will be back next year and better than ever. They are a class team.

ChrisL
